name: KoiSoft Services
body:
Welcome to KoiSoft's home on Github. Well as you may notice, we are pretty new and working on a website which should be out shortly. Until then, please feel free to contact us on koisoft@outlook.com.

## Services
* Jira Deployment, Administration and Customization
* JIRA Plugin Development, Upgrades


***


### Looking for any services related to Atlassian Products? 
Contact us at koisoft@outlook.com
